greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (Sum_{n=-inf..inf} x^(n^2))^(-1).
comment: Taylor series for 1/theta_3. Absolute values are coefficients in Taylor series for 1/theta_4.
reference: J. R. Newman, The World of Mathematics, Simon and Schuster, 1956, Vol. I p. 372.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
G. Almkvist, Asymptotic formulas and generalized Dedekind sums, Exper. Math., 7 (No. 4, 1998), pp. 343-359.
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups, Springer-Verlag, p. 103.
formula: Ramanujan gave an asymptotic formula (see Almkvist).
mathematica: terms = 35; 1/EllipticTheta[3, 0, x] + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 05 2017 *)
xref: See A015128 for a version without signs.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
